headline: Assessing BXP (NYSE:BXP) Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness And Cash Flow Estimates
summary: Why BXP’s recent performance has some investors taking a closer look BXP (BXP) has been under pressure recently, with the stock showing a 3.4% decline over the past day and a 10.3% decline over the past 3 months, prompting fresh questions about its current valuation. See our latest analysis for BXP. Looking beyond the latest move, BXP’s recent share price return has been weak over the past quarter and year to date, while its 3 year total shareholder return has been positive. This suggests...
